job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We are looking for a person to lead efforts within the Security Risk and Compliance organization to drive the development and maintenance of AI-enabled Risk and Compliance solutions across our products, downstream services, or infrastructure tools and platforms used within Uber globally!

   What You Will Do
     * Develop creative solutions and build prototypes for security, risk, and compliance problems using algorithms based on machine learning, statistics, and optimization, and work with engineering/product to deploy those algorithms and make an impact in production
     * Drive clarity and tackle ambiguous, challenging security, risk, and compliance problems using data-driven approaches
     * Propose and own data analysis (including modeling, coding, analytics, and experimentation) to drive business insight and facilitate decisions
     * Apply innovative solutions from Generative AI
     * Optimize Machine Learning models for time efficiency, performance, cost, scalability, and accuracy
     * Develop tools and processes for automatically training, updating, and evaluating Large Language Models (LLMs) for risk and compliance use cases
job_details.full_text:
Senior AI/ML Application Developer

We are looking for a person to lead efforts within the Security Risk and Compliance organization to drive the development and maintenance of AI-enabled Risk and Compliance solutions across our products, downstream services, or infrastructure tools and platforms used within Uber globally!

   What You Will Do
     * Develop creative solutions and build prototypes for security, risk, and compliance problems using algorithms based on machine learning, statistics, and optimization, and work with engineering/product to deploy those algorithms and make an impact in production
     * Drive clarity and tackle ambiguous, challenging security, risk, and compliance problems using data-driven approaches
     * Propose and own data analysis (including modeling, coding, analytics, and experimentation) to drive business insight and facilitate decisions
     * Apply innovative solutions from Generative AI
     * Optimize Machine Learning models for time efficiency, performance, cost, scalability, and accuracy
     * Develop tools and processes for automatically training, updating, and evaluating Large Language Models (LLMs) for risk and compliance use cases

profile_classification.rationale: The role emphasizes developing and deploying AI-enabled solutions for security, risk, and compliance, with a specific focus on Generative AI and LLMs. Key responsibilities include applying innovative solutions from Generative AI and developing tools for training and evaluating LLMs, aligning strongly with the GenAI Engineer profile.

phrases: drive the development and maintenance of AI-enabled Risk and Compliance solutions
drive business insight and facilitate decisions
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate a need to understand the business domain (Security, Risk, Compliance) and how AI solutions can address specific problems and drive business outcomes within that domain.

phrases: data analysis (including modeling, coding, analytics, and experimentation)
job_tasks.justification: While not explicitly detailing pipeline construction, 'data analysis' and 'modeling' imply the necessary steps of data preparation and feature engineering required for model development.

phrases: algorithms based on machine learning, statistics, and optimization
Apply innovative solutions from Generative AI
Optimize Machine Learning models for time efficiency, performance, cost, scalability, and accuracy
Develop tools and processes for automatically training, updating, and evaluating Large Language Models (LLMs)
job_tasks.justification: This task category is heavily represented by mentions of machine learning algorithms, Generative AI, LLMs, model optimization, and the training/evaluation processes for these models.

phrases: work with engineering/product to deploy those algorithms
job_tasks.justification: The job involves building prototypes, deploying algorithms into production with engineering teams, and developing tools, which are core software development activities integrated with AI.

phrases: deploy those algorithms and make an impact in production
Optimize Machine Learning models for time efficiency, performance, cost, scalability, and accuracy
Develop tools and processes for automatically training, updating, and evaluating Large Language Models (LLMs)
job_tasks.justification: The emphasis on deploying models to production, optimizing them for various operational metrics, and developing automated processes for training and evaluation directly aligns with MLOps responsibilities.

skills: Drive clarity and tackle ambiguous, challenging security, risk, and compliance problems
Apply innovative solutions from Generative AI
